body: An alchemist with an alchemist's kit is assumed to have all the material components needed for his extracts, mutagens, and bombs, except for those components that have a specific cost. An alchemist's kit provides no bonuses on Craft (alchemy) checks.
name: Alchemist's Kit
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Tools and Skill Kits/Alchemists Kit
